description.name: SPED - Escrituracao Contabil Digital - TIPO G
description.destination: A todas as empresas usuarias de sistema de escrituracao contabil digital'
description.object: Permitir que as empresas intimadas apresentem dados relativos aos seus negocios e/ou atividades economicas.
description.delivery: As informacoes serao apresentadas pelas pessoas juridicas quando solicitadas pelo fisco ou orgao regulador de setor

register.description: Outras inscricoes cadastrais do empresario ou sociedade empresaria

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery("TMPCSS" ,1,"SELECT CS2_ENTREF INSTIT, CS2_INSCR CODIGO FROM "+RetSQLName("CS2")+" CS2 WHERE CS2_FILIAL = '"+xFilial("CS2")+"' AND CS2_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND CS2.D_E_L_E_T_ = ' ' UNION SELECT CSS_INSTIT INSTIT, CSS_CODIGO CODIGO FROM "+RetSQLName("CSS")+" CSS WHERE CSS_FILIAL = '"+xFilial("CSS")+"' AND CSS_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND CSS.D_E_L_E_T_ = ' ' ")
ECDQuery("TMPCS2",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS2") + " WHERE CS2_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND CS2_CNPJ != '"+CS2->CS2_CNPJ+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CS2") )
ECDQuery("TMPCSR",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSR") + " WHERE CSR_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSR") )
ECDQuery("TMPCS9",1,"SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS9") + " WHERE CS9_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CS9") )

register.description: Identificacao do relacionamento com o participante

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery( "TMPCSW",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSW") + " WHERE CSW_CODLAY = '" + iif (lMoedfun, SUBSTR(CS0->CS0_MOEFUN, 9, 3),'') + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSW" ) + " ORDER BY " + iif (lMoedfun,"CSW_REGECD,","")+ " CSW_ORDEM " )
ECDQuery( "TMPCS3",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS3") + " WHERE CS3_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CS3" ) )

ECDQuery("TMPCS4",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS4") + "INNER JOIN " + RetSQLTab("CS0") + "ON CS4_FILIAL = CS0_FILIAL AND CS4_CODREV = CS0_CODREV WHERE CS4_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CS4_CONTA = '"+TMPCS3->CS3_CONTA+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CS4") + "AND CS0_AMRPC = '1' AND" + RetSQLCond("CS0") )

ECDQuery( "TMPCS6" ,1, " SELECT CS6_FILIAL,CS6_CODREV,CS6_CONTA,CS6_CCUSTO,CS6_CODAGL,CS6_AGLSUP,CS6_CODNAT FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS6") + " WHERE CS6_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CS6_CONTA = '"+TMPCS3->CS3_CONTA+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CS6") + " GROUP BY CS6_FILIAL,CS6_CODREV,CS6_CONTA,CS6_CCUSTO,CS6_CODAGL,CS6_AGLSUP,CS6_CODNAT " )
ECDQuery("TMPCST",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CST") + " WHERE CST_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CST_CTAPAI = '"+TMPCS3->CS3_CONTA+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CST"))
ECDQuery( "TMPCS7" ,1, " SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS7") + " WHERE CS7_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CS7"))
ECDQuery("TMPCS5" ,1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS5") + " WHERE CS5_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CS5"))

ECDQuery("AGLCSC",1," SELECT CSC_DTINI,CSC_DTFIM FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSC") + " WHERE CSC_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSC") + " GROUP BY CSC_DTINI,CSC_DTFIM ORDER BY CSC_DTINI,CSC_DTFIM " )

ECDQuery("TMPCSC",1, " SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSC") + " WHERE CSC_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSC_DTINI >= '"+AGLCSC->CSC_DTINI+"' AND CSC_DTFIM <= '"+AGLCSC->CSC_DTFIM+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSC") )

register.description: Saldos de Plano de Contas Anterior

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery( "TMPCSA",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSA") + " WHERE CSA_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSA"))

ECDQuery("TMPCSB",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSB") + " WHERE CSB_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSB_NUMLOT = '" + TMPCSA->CSA_NUMLOT + "' AND CSB_DTLANC = '" + TMPCSA->CSA_DTLANC + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSB"))

register.description: Saldo das contas de resultado antes do encerramento

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery( "TMPCSAENC",1, "SELECT CSA_DTLANC FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSA") +" WHERE CSA_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND CSA_DTLANC >= '"+DTOS(CS0->CS0_DTINI)+"' AND CSA_DTLANC <= '"+DTOS(CS0->CS0_DTFIM)+"' AND CSA_INDTIP = 'E' AND "+ RetSQLCond("CSA") + " GROUP BY CSA_DTLANC ORDER BY CSA_DTLANC" )

register.description: Detalhes dos Saldos das contas de resultado antes do encerramento

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery( "TMPCSBENC" ,1,"SELECT CSB_CODCTA,CSB_CCUSTO,SUM(CSB_VLPART) CSB_VLPART FROM(SELECT CSB_CODCTA,CSB_CCUSTO,CASE CSB_INDDC WHEN 'D' THEN -1 * CSB_VLPART WHEN 'C' THEN CSB_VLPART END CSB_VLPART FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSA") +" INNER JOIN " + RetSQLTab("CSB") +" ON CSA_FILIAL = CSB_FILIAL AND CSA_CODREV = CSB_CODREV AND CSA_DTLANC = CSB_DTLANC AND CSA_NUMLOT = SUBSTRING(CSB_NUMLOT,1,"+STR(TAMSX3("CSA_NUMLOT")[1])+") WHERE CSA_CODREV= '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND CSA_DTLANC = '"+TMPCSAENC->CSA_DTLANC+"' AND CSA_INDTIP = 'E' AND CSB_CODCTA IN ( SELECT DISTINCT CS3_CONTA FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS3") +" WHERE CS3_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND CS3_CODNAT='04' AND "+ RetSQLCond("CS3") + " ) AND " + RetSQLCond("CSA,CSB") + " ) ABCDE GROUP BY CSB_CODCTA,CSB_CCUSTO " )
ECDQuery("TMPCSD",1," SELECT * FROM "+RetSQLTab("CSD")+" WHERE CSD_CODREV='"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND CSD_TPDEM = '1' AND "+RetSQLCond("CSD"))

ECDQuery("TMPCSEBP" ,1," SELECT * FROM "+RetSQLTab("CSE")+" WHERE CSE_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSE_TPDEM = '1' AND CSE_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND "+RetSQLCond("CSE")+" ORDER BY CSE_CODAGL,CSE_NIVEL ")

ECDQuery("TMPCSEDRE",1," SELECT * FROM "+RetSQLTab("CSE")+" WHERE CSE_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSE_TPDEM = '2' AND CSE_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND "+RetSQLCond("CSE")+" ORDER BY CSE_CODAGL,CSE_NIVEL ")

register.description: Tabela de Historico de Fatos Contabeis

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery("TMPCSN" ,1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSN") + " WHERE CSN_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV +"' AND"+ RetSQLCond("CSN") + " ORDER BY CSN_REG, CSN_CODFAT")

ECDQuery("TMPCSEDMPL",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSE") + " WHERE CSE_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSE_TPDEM IN('3','4') AND CSE_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSE") + " ORDER BY CSE_CODAGL,CSE_NIVEL ")

validline.instruction: !EMPTY(ALLTRIM(CS0->CS0_LEIAUT )) .AND. CS6->(MsSeek(xFilial("CS6") + TMPCSEDMPL->CSE_CODREV + TMPCSEDMPL->CSE_CODAGL )) .OR. CSO->(MsSeek(xFilial("CSO") + TMPCSEDMPL->CSE_CODREV + TMPCSEDMPL->CSE_CODAGL ))

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery("TMPCSO" ,1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSO") + " WHERE CSO_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND CSO_CODAGL = '"+TMPCSEDMPL->CSE_CODAGL +"' AND CSO_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSEDMPL->CSE_PERIOD +"' AND "+ RetSQLCond("CSO") + " ORDER BY CSO_REG, CSO_CODAGL, CSO_CODFAT")
ECDQuery("TMPCSEDFC",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSE") + " WHERE CSE_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSE_TPDEM = '5' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSE") + " ORDER BY CSE_CODAGL,CSE_NIVEL ")
ECDQuery("TMPCSEDVA",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSE") + " WHERE CSE_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSE_TPDEM = '6' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSE") + " ORDER BY CSE_CODAGL,CSE_NIVEL ")

register.description: Demonstração do Resultado Abrangente do Período

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery("TMPCSFINI1",1, " SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR, CSF_NOMDEM FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '001' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") + " GROUP BY CSF_NOMDEM " )

register.description: Demonstração do Resultado Abrangente do Período

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery("TMPCSFDADOS1",1," SELECT R_E_C_N_O_ RECCSF FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '001' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF"))

register.description: Demonstração do Resultado Abrangente do Período

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery( "TMPCSFFIM1",1," SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '001' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFINI2",1, " SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR, CSF_NOMDEM FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '002' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") + " GROUP BY CSF_NOMDEM " )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFDADOS2",1," SELECT R_E_C_N_O_ RECCSF FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '002' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF"))

ECDQuery( "TMPCSFFIM2",1," SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '002' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFINI3",1, " SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR, CSF_NOMDEM FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '003' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") + " GROUP BY CSF_NOMDEM " )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFDADOS3",1," SELECT R_E_C_N_O_ RECCSF FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '003' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF"))

ECDQuery( "TMPCSFFIM3",1," SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '003' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFINI10",1, " SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR, CSF_NOMDEM FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '010' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") + " GROUP BY CSF_NOMDEM ")

ECDQuery("TMPCSFDADOS10",1," SELECT R_E_C_N_O_ RECCSF FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '010' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF"))

ECDQuery( "TMPCSFFIM10",1," SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '010' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFINI11",1, " SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR, CSF_NOMDEM FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '011' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") + " GROUP BY CSF_NOMDEM " )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFDADOS11",1," SELECT R_E_C_N_O_ RECCSF FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '011' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF"))

ECDQuery( "TMPCSFFIM11",1," SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '011' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFINI12",1, " SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR, CSF_NOMDEM FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '012' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") + " GROUP BY CSF_NOMDEM " )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFDADOS12",1," SELECT R_E_C_N_O_ RECCSF FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '012' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF"))

ECDQuery( "TMPCSFFIM12",1," SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '012' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFINI99",1, " SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR, CSF_NOMDEM FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '099' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") + " GROUP BY CSF_NOMDEM " )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFDADOS99",1," SELECT R_E_C_N_O_ RECCSF FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '099' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF"))

ECDQuery( "TMPCSFFIM99",1," SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J800' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '099' AND CSF_PERIOD = '"+TMPCSD->CSD_PERIOD+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFINI801",1, " SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR, CSF_NOMDEM, CSF_MOTSUB FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J801' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '001' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") + " GROUP BY CSF_NOMDEM, CSF_MOTSUB " )

ECDQuery("TMPCSFDADOS801",1," SELECT R_E_C_N_O_ RECCSF FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J801' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '001' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF"))

ECDQuery( "TMPCSFFIM801",1," SELECT COUNT(*) CONTADOR FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSF") + " WHERE CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREV = '" + CS0->CS0_CODREV + "' AND CSF_CODREG='J801' AND CSF_TIPDOC = '001' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSF") )
ECDQuery("TMPCS8",1,"SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS8") + " WHERE CS8_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND CS8_CODASS NOT IN ('910','920') AND " + RetSQLCond("CS8") )

register.description: Signatarios do termo de verificacao para fins de substituicao da ECD

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery("TMPCS8_SUB",1,"SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CS8") + " WHERE CS8_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND CS8_CODASS IN ('910','920') AND " + RetSQLCond("CS8") )
ECDQuery("TMPCSP",1,"SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CSP") + " WHERE CSP_CODREV = '"+CS0->CS0_CODREV+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CSP") )
ECDQuery( "TMPCQQ",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CQQ") + " WHERE CQQ_IDBLK = '" + CS0->CS0_IDBLK + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CQQ" ) + " ORDER BY CQQ_IDBLK " )
ECDQuery( "TMPCQR",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CQR") + " WHERE CQR_IDBLK = '" + CS0->CS0_IDBLK + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CQR" ) + " ORDER BY CQR_IDBLK " )
ECDQuery( "TMPCQS",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CQS") + " WHERE CQS_IDBLK = '" + CS0->CS0_IDBLK +"' AND CQS.CQS_CODEMP = '"+ TMPCQR->CQR_CODEMP +"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CQS" ) )

ECDQuery( "TMPCQT",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CQT") + " WHERE CQT_IDBLK = '" + CS0->CS0_IDBLK + "' AND CQT_CODEMP = '"+ TMPCQS->CQS_CODEMP +"' AND CQT_CODEVE = '"+ TMPCQS->CQS_CODEVE +"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CQT" ) )

register.description: Mapeamento para Planos de Contas das Empresas Consolidadas

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery( "TMPCQV" ,1, " SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CQV") + " WHERE CQV_IDBLK = '" + CS0->CS0_IDBLK + "' AND CQV_CODCTA = '"+TMPCQU->CQU_CODCTA +"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CQV"))
ECDQuery( "TMPCQX" ,1,"SELECT * FROM "+ RetSQLTab("CQX") + " WHERE CQX_IDBLK = '" + CS0->CS0_IDBLK + "' AND " + RetSqlCond("CQX") + " AND (CQX_VALAGL <> 0 OR CQX_VALEL <> 0 OR CQX_VLCONS <> 0) ")

register.description: Empresas Detentoras das Parcelas do Valor Eliminado Total

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery("TMPCQY",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CQY") + " WHERE CQY_IDBLK = '" + CS0->CS0_IDBLK + "' AND CQY_CODCTA = '"+TMPCQX->CQX_CODCTA+"' AND " + RetSQLCond("CQY"))

register.description: Empresas Contrapartes das Parcelas do Valor Eliminado Total

initiating.instruction: ECDQuery("TMPCQZ",1," SELECT * FROM " + RetSQLTab("CQZ") + " WHERE CQZ_IDBLK = '" + CS0->CS0_IDBLK + "' AND CQZ_CODCTA = '" + TMPCQY->CQY_CODCTA + "' AND CQZ_CODPAR = '" + TMPCQY->CQY_CODPAR + "' AND " + RetSQLCond("CQZ"))
